name: IkeaKnight
description:
"... After i got my new living room cupboard, everything seemed ready for assembly. If not this stupid plug No. 101351 had been missing. So I went to IKE to get one."

IkeaKnight is a rougelike RPG with procedural levels, neat pixel graphics, a unique retro soundtrack, a crafting system as well as a complete fighting and looting system.

IkeaKnight was created for ZFXAction6 by Simon "Laguna_999" Weis and "Fleischkind" during one weekend.
